name: drupal/lightning_layout
description: Provides the tools to take control of your layout.

suggest.drupal/bg_image_formatter: Allows editors to set an image in the background of a block.
suggest.drupal/entity_block: Allows any entity to be displayed in a block.
suggest.drupal/entity_browser_block: Allows entity browsers to be used when editing layouts.
suggest.drupal/layout_builder_restrictions: Allows site builders to control which blocks and layouts are allowed in Layout Builder.
suggest.drupal/layout_builder_styles: Allows editors to apply styles to Layout Builder blocks and sections.
suggest.drupal/layout_library: Allows content editors to pick from a list of pre-defined layouts when building pages.
suggest.drupal/simple_gmap: Provides a way to add Google Maps to layouts.
